TopicTitle: [Video] Music Video | Laythe Rescue - SSTO VTOL Ship

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I spent some time making an SSTO VTOL with some mods and made a music video of it rescuing a capsule from Laythe. This is part 3 of the Laythe trilogy but it can be viewed separately.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e4wzOJlYOok
